aka: Blow: The True Story of Cocaine, a Bear, and a Crooked Kentucky Cop
trans_title: Blow: The True Story of Cocaine, a Bear, and a Crooked Kentucky Cop
introduction: Cocaine Bear: The True Story is the bizarre, stranger than fiction tale behind the hit Hollywood movie Cocaine Bear. It involves international drug smuggling, murder, mayhem, and a mysterious dead body in a suburban driveway wearing a watch that shoots tear gas. How a Georgia bear on cocaine and a Kentucky blueblood soldier of fortune will be forever linked is a modern-day legend.
